TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MethodBody extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MethodBody extends System.Object
.class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit MethodBody extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对方法体的元数据和 MSIL 的访问权限。

span.span: Provides access to the metadata and MSIL for the body of a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供对方法体中的局部变量和异常处理子句的信息的访问，以及对构成方法体的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 的访问。The class provides access to information about the local variables and exception-handling clauses in a method body, and to the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) that makes up the method body. 您可以使用 module 类的标记解析方法（如 、 和 ）将方法体中的标记解析为 对象、 对象和 对象，这些对象提供有关方法体中的 MSIL 访问的类型、方法和字段的详细信息。You can use the token-resolution methods of the module class, such as , , and , to resolve the tokens in the method body to objects, objects, and objects that provide detailed information about the types, methods, and fields accessed by the MSIL in the method body. > [!NOTE] > 分析方法体需要透彻地了解元数据和 MSIL 指令格式。Parsing method bodies requires a thorough understanding of metadata and MSIL instruction formats. 有关信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是 "第二部分：元数据定义和语义" 和 "第三部分： CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. 若要获取 给定方法的对象，请首先获取 该方法的对象，然后调用该 对象的 方法。To obtain a object for a given method, first obtain a object for the method, then call the object's method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为的测试方法 `MethodBodyExample` ，并显示其本地变量信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample` and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取 测试方法的对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 该示例使用 属性获取对象的列表 ，然后显示对象的类型和索引顺序。The example uses the property to obtain a list of objects and then displays their types and index order. 属性用于获取异常处理子句的列表。The property is used to obtain a list of exception-handling clauses. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在对象的构造过程中由派生类调用 。This constructor is invoked by derived classes during the construction of objects.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ExceptionHandlingClauses As IList(Of ExceptionHandlingClause)
Public ReadOnly Property ExceptionHandlingClauses As IList(Of ExceptionHandlingClause)

summary.span: 获取在方法主体中包含所有异常处理的子句的列表。

span.span: Gets a list that includes all the exception-handling clauses in the method body.

value.span: 对象的 表示方法主体中异常处理的子句。

span.span: An of objects representing the exception-handling clauses in the body of the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此列表包括方法体中所有 try 块的所有子句。The list includes all clauses from all try blocks in the method body. 每个 对象都包含标识与其关联的 try 块的信息。Each object contains information that identifies the try block with which it is associated. > [!NOTE] > 使用异常处理子句需要全面了解元数据和 MSIL 指令格式。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and MSIL instruction formats. 有关信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是 "第二部分：元数据定义和语义" 和 "第三部分： CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为的测试方法 `MethodBodyExample` ，并显示有关其异常处理子句的信息。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample` and displays information about its exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取 测试方法的对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 属性用于获取对象的列表 。The property is used to obtain a list of objects. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]

summary.span: 以字节数组的形式返回用于方法体的 MSIL。

span.span: Returns the MSIL for the method body, as an array of bytes.

returns.span: 类型 的数组包含用于方法体的 MSIL。

span.span: An array of type that contains the MSIL for the method body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 module 类的标记解析方法（如 、 和 ）将方法体中的标记解析为 对象、 对象和 对象，这些对象提供有关方法体中的 MSIL 访问的类型、方法和字段的详细信息。You can use the token-resolution methods of the module class, such as , , and , to resolve the tokens in the method body to objects, objects, and objects that provide detailed information about the types, methods, and fields accessed by the MSIL in the method body. > [!NOTE] > 分析方法体需要透彻地了解元数据和 MSIL 指令格式。Parsing method bodies requires a thorough understanding of metadata and MSIL instruction formats. 有关信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是 "第二部分：元数据定义和语义" 和 "第三部分： CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示方法体中的局部变量是否初始化为相应类型的默认值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether local variables in the method body are initialized to the default values for their types.

value.span: 如果方法体包含用于将局部变量初始化为 （对于引用类型）或者零初始值（对于值类型）的代码，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the method body contains code to initialize local variables to for reference types, or to the zero-initialized value for value types; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是指未显式初始化的变量; 即，用语法（如 `int x;` c # 中的或在 Visual Basic 中声明的变量 `Dim x As Integer` 。The property refers to variables that are not explicitly initialized; that is, variables that are declared with syntax such as `int x;` in C# or `Dim x As Integer` in Visual Basic. 默认情况下，引用变量将初始化为 `null` 。Reference variables are initialized to `null` by default. 数值变量初始化为零。Numeric variables are initialized to zero. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为的测试方法 `MethodBodyExample` ，并显示其本地变量信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample` and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取 测试方法的对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 显示和 属性。The and properties are displayed. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取签名的元数据标记，该签名描述元数据中的方法的局部变量。

span.span: Gets a metadata token for the signature that describes the local variables for the method in metadata.

value.span: 表示元数据标记的整数。

span.span: An integer that represents the metadata token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可获取有关该方法的本地变量的信息。Use the property to obtain information about the method's local variables. > [!NOTE] > 有关本地变量签名的信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是 "第二部分：元数据定义和语义"。Information about local variable signatures can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property LocalVariables As IList(Of LocalVariableInfo)
Public ReadOnly Property LocalVariables As IList(Of LocalVariableInfo)

summary.span: 获取方法体中声明的局部变量的列表。

span.span: Gets the list of local variables declared in the method body.

value.span: 对象的一个 ，这些对象描述在方法体中声明的局部变量。

span.span: An of objects that describe the local variables declared in the method body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要由属性提供的局部变量签名的元数据标记 。You do not need the metadata token for the local variable signature provided by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为的测试方法 `MethodBodyExample` ，并显示其本地变量信息。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample` and displays its local variable information. 方法用于获取 测试方法的对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 属性用于获取对象的列表 。The property is used to obtain a list of objects. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#3)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#6)]

summary.span: 执行方法时，获取操作堆栈上的项的最大数目。

span.span: Gets the maximum number of items on the operand stack when the method is executing.

value.span: 执行方法时操作数堆栈上的项的最大数目。

span.span: The maximum number of items on the operand stack when the method is executing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是 "第二部分：元数据定义和语义" 和 "第三部分： CIL 指令集"。For more information, see the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为的测试方法 `MethodBodyExample` ，并显示其本地变量信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample` and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取 测试方法的对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 显示和 属性。The and properties are displayed. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
